title: Encyclopedia Galactica Rest Api Sdk Source Code Generator Configuration file schema
description: Encyclopedia Galactica development toolset includes a code generator. This is the schema of the configuration file for the generator.

lang.description: The generated programming language. For example: cshapr

openapi_specification_path.description: Path to the OpenApi specification file in yaml format

target_directory.description: Path to the directory where the generated source will be placed. It is also the Solution directory.

solution_base_namespace.description: The base namespace of the solution.

dto_project_name.description: The name of the Data Transfer Object's project.

dto_project_additional_path.description: The additional path within the Dto project where the Dto files will be generated

skip_dto_preprocess.description: Controls whether DTO objects related data will be preprocessed. Useful in testing.

skip_dto_generating.description: Controls whether DTO objects will be generated or not.

skip_dto_test_preprocess.description: Controls whether Dto tests related data will be preprocessed. Useful in testing.

dto_project_namespace.description: Namespace of the Dto project. Will be concatenated to solution base namespace

dto_test_project_namespace.description: Namespace of the Dto test project. It will be concatenated with solution base namespace
